itemListElement.name: Vegan Almond Butter Mousse Strawberry Parfaits

@graph.name: Almond Butter Mousse Strawberry Parfaits
@graph.description: Almond Butter Mousse Strawberry Parfaits. Almond or peanut butter thickened into a mousse and layered with strawberries. PB & J parfaits. Vegan, Gluten-free, Grain-free Recipe. Easily doubled or halved.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups non dairy milk  (such as almond milk, soy milk or coconut milk)
2/3  cup smooth almond butter (or use peanut butter or other nut butter)
chocolate syrup or vegan caramel for garnish (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the ingredients under almond butter mousse until well blended. Pour into a saucepan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the ingredients under almond butter mousse until well blended. Pour into a saucepan over medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a gentle boil, stirring occasionally to avoid burning or sticking at the bottom. 8 to 10 mins. Carefully taste and adjust sweet. Simmer for another minute and take off heat. Let it cool to room temperature. The mixture will thicken as it cools.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to a gentle boil, stirring occasionally to avoid burning or sticking at the bottom. 8 to 10 mins. Carefully taste and adjust sweet. Simmer for another minute and take off heat. Let it cool to room temperature. The mixture will thicken as it cools.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the parfaits: add a sprinkle of crushed crackers or cookies. then a layer of strawberries, then a helping of the almond butter mousse. Repeat depending on the size of the parfait. See notes to make a pie
recipeInstructions.name: Make the parfaits: add a sprinkle of crushed crackers or cookies. then a layer of strawberries, then a helping of the almond butter mousse. Repeat depending on the size of the parfait. See notes to make a pie

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle melted chocolate or vegan caramel on top. Variations: Layer with chocolate ganache and raspberry compote
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle melted chocolate or vegan caramel on top. Variations: Layer with chocolate ganache and raspberry compote

@graph.keywords: almond butter mousse, peanut butter mousse, peanut butter mousse recipe
